name: How to be a cool assassin
name_original: How to be a cool assassin
description:
HOW TO BE A COOL ASSASSIN

Inspired by: https://twitter.com/WikihowDreams/status/925047244834816001

You are an assassin.  You are cool.  You are the fridge. Wait for your time to strike, and kill all of the party guests.

Fridge controls: 1,2,3,4.  Press Space to attack a guest, but only when the situation temperature is COOL.

This is a jam entry, and hooboy. You can't actually win.  Pat yourself on the back after you kill five guests, then ALT+F4.  Thanks for playing!
